page.title: 07Family Life.
page.content: {Family Life in Alburgh The extended family is an important feature in the way of life of rural Norfolk.There are many instances of families living in the same area as grand parents, great grand parents and aunts, uncles and cousins. With support from relatives such as these these living close at hand the local family tends to be very self contained, needing little extra social life. The ownership of farms is pasted on from gereration to gereration with the children growing up in the knowlefge that their future will be in the farm. In many families both parents are wage earners. This is made posible by the number of electical machines used in the home such as washing machines,dish washers,vacum cleaners,freezers and microwave ovens.
